Network Unavailable. Please check your network!
(1) uled app reset: This method will directly reset the lights to the factory settings through the App. Please ensure that the lights are connected.

(2)Light: Connect to power supply for 6 second, disconnect to power supply for 6s, repeat about 5-6 times until the light flashes. Switch: Connect to power supply and simultaneously press the upper left button and the lower right button of the 4 buttons. The led will blink. Sensor: Connect to power supply for 3 second, disconnect to power supply for 3 second, repeat about 5-6 times until the sensor flashes.
3. Some Huawei phones have Bluetooth instability
Huawei WAS-AL00, Huawei P9 is not recommended as a control terminal

Some mobile phones may be used for too long and the Bluetooth may become unusable. You can try to turn off the Bluetooth of your phone and then turn it on. Even some low-end models need to restart the phone to use Bluetooth.
Add up to 255 groups up to the current limit
Lights in some groups failed to move out of the group
Sync failed, some data may be lost, still exit?
Group failed, Bluetooth is not connected, please check Bluetooth status
The delay should not exceed 255 minutes or 255 seconds
Please select an update file first!
Do not quit or disconnect during the update process
Please be close to the lights when updating!
*Long press to save, tap to apply

Click here to apply the scene

Do you really want to cancel the installation

After successful installation, the blue light at the bottom of the switch will blink and disconnect. Please unplug the USB cable on the switch before using the switch. If the switch does not have a USB interface, it is not necessary to perform the operation of unplugging the USB cable.
Please switch the night light to the configuration mode first.
Up to 8 groups can be choice
Do you want to save the scene?
You can only add up to 6 gradients!
Please select at least one group
Monochrome temperature, dual color temperature light
Dimming color switch, scene switch, glass switch
First step\nPlease make sure the device is connected to the power
Step 2\nPlease make sure the device is not connected to the network
First step\nPlug the USB into the switch
Step 3\nThe indicator on the right side of the bottom of the switch will be always on.
If you encounter problems, please try the following steps to reset the device
Lamp: Connect the power for 6 seconds, disconnect the power for 6 seconds, repeat 5–6 times until the light flashes.
panel switch: Connect the power supply while holding down the upper left button and the lower right button in the switch button. The blue light will always be on during the period.

Sensor (with key) : press and hold the side reset key until the light flashes.\n Sensor (no button) : turn on the power for 3 seconds, turn off the power for 3 seconds, repeat about 5-6 times until the sensor flashes.
Curtain: Long press the button at the bottom of the curtain for 5 seconds. The indicator is always on. Let go and press the button again until the indicator flashes for 3 times.
Bluetooth receiver: long press the white button of the receiver for 5 seconds, until the bluetooth receiver flashes.
Gateway: Long press the white button of the gateway for 5 seconds until the gateway blinks.

Uled smart platform understands the importance of your privacy to you and fully respects it.The mobile phone number registered on Uled platform is only used for the operation of Uled smart products.Without your consent, we will not access or process your content data for any purpose except as required by applicable laws and regulations.
